columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of parameter. Valid parameter types include the following: String, StringList, and SecureString.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parameter.

columns.name: data_type
columns.description: The data type of the parameter, such as text or aws:ec2:image. The default is text.

columns.name: key_id
columns.description: The ID of the query key used for this parameter.

columns.name: last_modified_date
columns.description: Date the parameter was last changed or updated.

columns.name: last_modified_user
columns.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS user who last changed the parameter.

columns.name: selector
columns.description: Either the version number or the label used to retrieve the parameter value.

columns.name: source_result
columns.description: SourceResult is the raw result or response from the source. Applies to parameters that reference information in other AWS services.

columns.name: policies
columns.description: A list of policies associated with a parameter. Parameter policies help you manage a growing set of parameters by enabling you to assign specific criteria to a parameter such as an expiration date or time to live. Parameter policies are especially helpful in forcing you to update or delete passwords and configuration data stored in Parameter Store.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the parameter.
